ygData.subject: Re: binding
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually if ya think about it, it makes perfect sense, we can help the others get back quicker............ Jaezebel Bladesong, Gypsy Bard of the 19th stanza
ygData.messageBody:
Actually if ya think about it, it makes perfect sense, we can help the
others get back quicker............

Jaezebel Bladesong, Gypsy Bard of the 19th stanza
-----Original Message-----
From: MrS8N@... <MrS8N@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, June 21, 1999 11:52 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] binding


>From: MrS8N@...
>
>Kay...I don't think we need to bind ourselves but it would be good if we
>could be bound by those who can bind to places other than cities. It
really
>screws the party when all the spell casters are bound to a dungeon and we
>hapless bards and warriors have to run for 15 minutes just to get to our
>putrid corpses. My two dubloons.
>
>Cooter
